DOC.brief_summary: This 2 arm study assess effect Xenical body mass index ( BMI ) obese overweight adolescent . Patients randomise one 2 group ; group undergo regimen mildly hypocaloric diet physical exercise , one group also receive Xenical 120mg po tid . The anticipated time study treatment 1 year , target sample size < 100 individual .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Xenical ( Orlistat ) Overweight Obese Adolescents
DOC.criteria: adolescent patient , 1214 year age overweight obese age < 12 > 14 year BMI normal range
